Shuffleboggie

A blues-like shuffle beat. Written for Kansas City.

  • ShuffleBoggie
  • ShuffleBoggie1
  • ShuffleBoggieSus
  • ShuffleBoggieIntro
  • ShuffleBoggieIntro4
  • ShuffleBoggieEnd

ShuffleBoggie

Blues with a shuffle style. (2)

ShuffleBoggieEnd
